items.name: House Price Predictor
items.description: Simple app that predicts house prices using linear regression. Trained on Washington King county property data corpus. Leverages scikit-learn and FastAPI

items.name: Transformer
items.description: A library to transform attribute-based objects between different representations like SCIM, LDIF, etc. Kotlin + Gradle.

items.name: FormFill
items.description: A Chrome browser extension that lets you quickly populate HTML text fields with preset values. It can save, edit, and delete frequently used text entries as presets. It also supports bulk import and export of presets. It offers a one-click fill experience with visual feedback for efficiency and usability.

items.name: Observer
items.description: Demonstrates lightweight method execution time logging with AOP.

items.name: Blockchain
items.description: A simple implementation of blockchain data-structure.

items.name: NN-zero-to-hero
items.description: personal fork of Andrej Karpathy's "Neural Networks: Zero to Hero" series for self-learning.

items.name: DevEnv
items.description: My personal configurations for Zsh, Vim, Git, and various command line apps. It helps me quickly set-up or reset my dev env.

items.name: Tutorial
items.description: Tutorial for publishing packages in GitHub.
